Label.en: Well... thousands of small businesses were involved in running the market, and had to move away all at the same time
Label.fr: Un millier de petits commerces faisaient vivre le marché et dure déménager en quelques jours, ce qui entraîna à terme la gentrification du centre-ville
Label.es: Well... thousands of small businesses were involved in running the market, and had to move away all at the same time

Label.en: Also, many businesses around the market itself were involved in...
Label.fr: Egalement, beaucoup de commerces alentours se chargaient..

Label.en: No... providing food and drinks to all the businesses and their customers!
